["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://repo-ck.com/","rel":"nofollow","children":"repo-ck"}]," 是
",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://archlinux.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Arch"}]," 的非官方仓库，内有包含 ck
补丁、BFS
调度器等，通用或为特定 CPU 架构优化过的内核，以及内核相关的软件包，是居家旅行，优化折腾的必备良药。更多内容，参考
",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/repo-ck","rel":"nofollow","children":"ArchWiki"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"食用方法","children":"食用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 里添加"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[repo-ck]
Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再增加 GPG 信任："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"pacman-key -r 5EE46C4C && pacman-key --lsign-key 5EE46C4C","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pacman -Sy"}]," 即可。"]}]]}]
